title: Rabia Chaudry: "Adnan's Story"
description: As the case of Adnan Syed comes back into the news with Baltimore, MD prosecutors signaling they will vacate his conviction for a new trial, we offer up this interview from Michael's archives, with Rabia Chaudry, author of "Adnan's Story: The Search for Truth and Justice After Serial." Original air date 10 August 2016. The book was published on 9 August 2016.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Rabia Chaudry, Michael Smerconish)
